plot: Pose is a ten minute experimental documentary that explores the visceral experience of posing as a nude model, while in the process revealing a character study in contrast and contradiction...
title: Pose
plot_es: Pose is a ten minute experimental documentary that explores the visceral experience of posing as a nude model, while in the process revealing a character study in contrast and contradiction...
